data.actual_result: The server settings pane stays open and overlaps the user settings
data.expected_result: When the user settings menu opens, the server settings pane should close
data.short_description: The individual server settings pane stays open when you open global user preferences on MacOS
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the server specific Settings Pane - Click on Discord Canary in the Task Bar - Click on preferences
